translations: 守旧者，老保守；抱残守缺的人

sentences.sentence: He sounds like such an old fogey !
sentences.translation: 他说话听起来真是个老顽固！

sentences.sentence: Come to the disco and stop being such an old fogey!
sentences.translation: 来参加迪斯科舞会吧！别再当老顽固了！

sentences.sentence: Isn't that old fogey Boris's grandson come from Roman?
sentences.translation: 那不是罗曼村的鲍里斯老头的孙子吗？
